title: League client not opening

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Okay so this just happened today, kinda near midnight and Ive had no issues with the client until now and it keeps say that something might be blocked by firewall or internet issues yet ive checked both and nothing is wrong.





okay ive found a post and most of you probably have also found this post but im just still going to put it here



http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uQqoGVbw-cant-log-in-heres-a-fix

replies.body: This error message you're seeing might be a little misleading, and actually due to a security setting preventing the game from launching properly.  You can use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings, but this may actually be less about your network and instead your permissions.  I suggest going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your PC is allowing league access.  Hope that helps!

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5efdy9/fix_for_rads_error_patch_623/

Here is the solution for windows.
No other methods have worked except for this one

I am also affected and none of the "fixes" have worked, literally all the stuff they are saying to delete is not in the RADS folders. Admin is not working. even running on a different DNS isn't working.

Always run as admin.  


Op- Try it now.  Should be able to connect.

> [{quoted}](name=S0suke Aizen,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0P9UUOzs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-23T04:46:07.755+0000)
>
> Always run as admin.  
> 
> 
> Op- Try it now.  Should be able to connect.

Tried, same error pops up.
doesn't work. did that right after the first try.
yeah theres an outage this is happening to alot of people currently im affected too

Also been having this problem. Running as admin doesn't fix, nor do any of the other 'fixes' I found for RADS issues when googling (manually adding the .exe to be allowed through the firewall, deleting files and folders in the RADS folder, etc.)

ETA: like the above poster, I'm a windows 10 user who was in the new client too.
I've been having this issue for the past two hours. I'm on Windows 10 and opted in for the beta client.
I'm getting the same message. I wasn't on recently so I thought it was just me or something.
Same here.  Played a couple arams close to an hour ago tried to get back on and can't
